alert.note: Alert for Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Pasco and eastern Hernando Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 644 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pebble Creek to 6 miles south of Bushnell. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dade City, Lutz, St. Leo, Land O Lakes, Hill n Dale, Wesley Chapel South, Pebble Creek, Keystone, Ridge Manor, San Antonio, Saint Leo, Darby, Wesley Chapel, Gowers Corner, Blanton, Odessa, Spring Lake, Nobleton, Lacoochee and Meadow Pointe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
